several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press. She went on live television and drank vodka. The actress appeared on the "Late Show With David Letterman ' on Wednesday. David Letterman asked her what Betty White 's hobbies are now. David Letterman asked her, What do you like to do in your free time. She replied, "Oh I like to do most anything, play with animals mostly and uh Vodka is kind of a hobby. And as if the moment couldn"t get any more scripted, David Letterman pulled out two glasses with ice and vodka. Betty White drank out of the cup as David Letterman drank out of the bottle.

Cultural sensitivities Mr Eric Schmidt spoke about the importance to the company of taking into consideration the cultural sensitivities of different countries. It makes sense to me that governments will play a role in watching what we do, he said, referring to anti-trust and privacy concerns.
